text: Josef Rumler (20 July 1922 in Chlumec nad Cidlinou – 1 November 1999 in Prague) was a Czech poet, literary critic, historian, editor and translator from Polish language and to Esperanto. == Garners == * Vynášení houslí (1970) * Hrnek ranního mléka (1973) * Výstup na horu Říp (1978) Category:Czech poets Category:Male poets Category:Czech male writers Category:1922 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Czech Esperantists Category:20th-century poets Category:20th-century male writers Category:Czech translators Category:People from Chlumec nad Cidlinou Category:20th-century translators
title: Josef Rumler
